traces_priority: Vidyadhara Ichor Lines > Aquatic Benediction > Qihuang Analects

conesNew.notes: Best all-around Light Cone option for most healers, providing good base stats, healing boost, and a bonus healing effect. Also, it's the only Abundance Light Cone that can directly increase allies' damage (via ATK stacks).
Gives Bailu HP% and Healing Output which improves her bulkiness and Healing at the same time. Sadly, got powercrept by Huohuo Light Cone which does everything better.

Cheap and strong option especially if Bailu has high investment to where her Skill isn't needed as much. Advance Forward on basic attack means she can generate more SP for the team and get to her turns faster. The low base stats can be troublesome for lower investments.
Energy Regen is always welcome and Bailu can also make use of the additional healing on Ultimate, though a lot of her healing does come from the Talent.
Strong lightcone that double dips on Effect RES for stronger healing, helps with Broken Keel requirements.
Superimposition 5 accessible as a F2P from the forgotten hall shop. Sacrifices healing for more energy for the team but can be RNG.
